snippet: Etsy shares sank almost 14 percent in aftermarket trading after its first earnings report as a publicly traded company showed a hefty quarterly loss.
abstract: Etsy reports quarterly net loss of $36.6 million, or 84 cents per share, in its first earnings report as a publicly traded company; losses, related to restructuring and a tax provision, send shares down almost 14 percent.
lead_paragraph: Etsy shares sank almost 14 percent in aftermarket trading after its first earnings report as a publicly traded company showed a hefty quarterly loss.

headline.print_headline: Etsy’s Shares Tumble After Earnings Disappoint
headline.main: Etsy’s Shares Tumble After Earnings Disappoint
